CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 9 reads: "Homemakers See Latest in Foods, Appliances 1. Steaming 8 o'clock coffee poured in a constant stream from the A&P booth with Miss Geraldine Smith and Charles Muehlman doing the pouring...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Geraldine Smith and Charles Muehlman standing behind A & P Food Company display booth in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
